run.output:
No implementation exists yet for the official website project. This is the TDD red phase where comprehensive simulation scenarios have been generated based on the PRD requirements. Tests will be created once the website framework is set up. The scenarios cover:

1. Homepage Hero Section Display
2. Platform Detection and Download Recommendation
3. Multi-language Support and Language Switcher
4. Features Showcase Section
5. API Key Configuration Documentation
6. Performance Optimization and Core Web Vitals
7. SEO Implementation and Meta Tags
8. Accessibility Compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA)
9. Mobile Responsive Design
10. GitHub Integration and Social Proof
11. Documentation Navigation and Search
12. Analytics and Conversion Tracking

All scenarios are marked as 'not_implemented' and include detailed steps, test cases, and implementation notes to guide future development.

notes: This is a TDD red phase - no implementation or tests exist yet
Website framework needs to be chosen (recommended: Next.js, Astro, or SvelteKit)
Test framework will be selected based on website framework choice
- Next.js: Jest + React Testing Library + Playwright for E2E
All 12 scenarios have been defined with comprehensive test cases
Implementation should follow the scenarios to achieve TDD green phase
Once website framework is set up, create test files following framework conventions
next_steps: Choose website framework (Next.js recommended for React ecosystem alignment)
Create test files based on the 12 scenarios
Implement features to make tests pass (TDD green phase)
Run tests and update SCENARIOS_TO_BUILD.json with actual results
